meanings.definition: Dweebiest (adjective): most nerdy or socially awkward
meanings.sent1: She wore the dweebiest glasses to the party.
meanings.sent2: He felt like the dweebiest person in the room.
meanings.sent3: The dweebiest kid in school tried to impress everyone with his science project.
meanings.sent4: His dweebiest outfit made him stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The dweebiest character in the movie was endearing to the audience.

meanings.definition: Dweebiest (adverb): in the most nerdy or socially awkward manner
meanings.sent1: She danced dweebiest at the school dance.
meanings.sent2: He spoke dweebiest when trying to impress his crush.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked dweebiest across the keyboard, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The car alarm blared dweebiest in the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes landed dweebiest with the audience.
